sentences.sContent: ...a place where we meet and parley.
I don't think you've ever tried parleying with Jorge, have you?
sentences.sCn: 我想你没有尝试与乔治和谈过，是吗？

trans.tranOther: When two opposing people or groups parley, they meet to discuss something in order to come to an agreement
a discussion in which enemies try to achieve peace
